title: How to Warm Soft Cheese

steps.headline: Remove from the fridge.
steps.description: Unwrap the cheese, if it has a wrapper.

steps.headline: Put unwrapped cheese in the microwave.
Microwave briefly.
steps.description: By way of example, a 4.4 oz/ 125 g piece of cheese should be heated on Low (30% power) for 30-45 seconds, on average. For microwaves that run on high power, 15-25 seconds at the most should warm the cheese imperceptibly. The cheese should be slightly warmed right through.

steps.headline: Remove from the microwave.
steps.description: Leave to stand for 5 minutes prior to serving.

steps.headline: Remember to remove the cheese well in advance of eating them next time.
steps.description: Soft cheese should be given ample time to warm up to room temperature simply by sitting out.

text: Remove from the fridge. Unwrap the cheese, if it has a wrapper. Put unwrapped cheese in the microwave.  Microwave briefly. By way of example, a 4.4 oz/ 125 g piece of cheese should be heated on Low (30% power) for 30-45 seconds, on average. For microwaves that run on high power, 15-25 seconds at the most should warm the cheese imperceptibly. The cheese should be slightly warmed right through. Remove from the microwave. Leave to stand for 5 minutes prior to serving. Remember to remove the cheese well in advance of eating them next time. Soft cheese should be given ample time to warm up to room temperature simply by sitting out.
